title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case). The busy cursor should be shown during this process.
EB: The updating of checkboxes in the Export Zip feature should use a busy cursor to indicate that the process is ongoing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. In a workspace with many projects, go to the Export Zip feature. 2. Select all projects. 3. Choose the desired file types. 4. Press ok.
